about_the_game:
You play as a talented rapper on a mission to record his best song while being tormented by an entity that haunts the abandoned studio that your friend Keith bought. Can you make it though this indie horror game?

Will you be able to face the darkness and free the studio from its cursed grip, or will the entity silence your voice forever?

Armed with nothing but your rhymes and the power of your music, you must confront the entity, navigate the perilous environment, and uncover the secrets hidden within the studio’s walls.

Key features

  • Rich story: Dive into a gripping narrative filled with twists, mysterious characters, and chilling encounters. Uncover hidden stories about the studio’s former artist, the origin of the entity.

  • Atmospheric Retro Visuals: Experience a hauntingly immersive world brought to life with nostalgic retro aesthetics. Explore decaying rooms, forgotten sound booths, and eerie corridors as you uncover the studio’s dark past.

  • Drive to the studio: drive a car to the studio in sections of the game.

  • Intense Boss Battles: Face off against powerful manifestations of the entity in epic, music minigame-based battles.

  • Local co op campaign: Play the whole story in local co op for more fun. Controller is required for local multiplayer.

  • Amazing music: by SEG-Z and SAZZY.

  • Short and sweet runtime: the whole game is only about 1 hour to 2 hours to complete.

Will you be able to face the darkness and free the studio from its cursed grip, or will the entity silence your voice forever?

Armed with nothing but your rhymes and the power of your music, you must confront the entity, navigate the perilous environment, and uncover the secrets hidden within the studio’s walls.

  • Atmospheric Retro Visuals: Experience a hauntingly immersive world brought to life with nostalgic retro aesthetics. Explore decaying rooms, forgotten sound booths, and eerie corridors as you uncover the studio’s dark past.

  • Local co op campaign: Play the whole story in local co op for more fun. Controller is required for local multiplayer.

movies.name: STUDIO SCREAM - VERSE ONE - OFFICAL TRAILER

name: STUDIO SCREAM - VERSE ONE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10.
  • Processor: Core i7-6700 or Ryzen 5 1600.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 839 MB available space

Will you be able to face the darkness and free the studio from its cursed grip, or will the entity silence your voice forever?
